analysis.key_quote: Schedule F would be tantamount to a turn towards tyranny. Which surgeon would you prefer perform open heart surgery on your loved one? The best possible surgeon or someone who was hired because they are a friend of the hospital administrator?
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, arguing that it undermines the merit-based system and due process protections for civil servants, while also raising concerns about the potential for politicization of the civil service.
